name: Potent Potions Magical Shop
description:
Read First:
Space to start game.

Click on herbs to add to your potion. Click "Sell" to sell your current potion.  After you make 10 potions, the day is finished and the game is over.

The 3 numbers below the herbs are:
Cost/Value Added/Chance of Success

Cost = how much gold it will cost you
Value Added = how much it will add to your potion if successful
Chance of Success = chance of adding value to your potion

The more ingredients you add, the lower the success of the current potion. Better herbs are riskier!  

Happy brewing!

I was a one man team on this.  I did the idea, programming, a bit of the art and design.  But, I wouldn't have been able to do this without wonderful art and music from various wonderful artists I've purchased from over the years. 
Herb art: https://visustella.itch.io/
Potion Design: Erkmen Design
